phrase.text: Hello, mentor! What interesting things can you tell?

Hey. Yes, here we were alone in the camp. I did not go into details, I know that she needs help. If you want to help, do not be shy. Consider that she's new in the Zone and you'll have to deal with her very hard.
Hmm. sounds very interesting. I have nothing special to do, so come on.
I do not want to bother with novices.
In general, she lives somewhere in the camp. Coordinates, I'll throw you on the PDA.
Hello! You do not often meet new faces in our camp, let alone a girl.
Hey. My name is Alice. I just came to the Zone.
I need help, at least for the first time. Will you help me?
How can I help a person about whom I do not know anything?
Oh, I'm sorry. Completely flew out of my head. In the Zone, I left myself and the reason I have is quite unusual. Here's how you think, from what people usually go to the Zone?
Money to work, from the law to escape, well, or are looking for someone here. Have not you come here for these reasons?

Just an adventure on the ass wanted. Haha. In fact, I read a lot about the Zone on the big earth and always wanted to get here. For me, the Zone is something unusual and interesting. I come from St. Petersburg, I just graduated from university and went here. I had to save money for passage in Zone and starting equipment.
You paid for the passage?

Well, of course. I'm not so experienced as to climb through the fence. Books are books, but I have no experience at all. I can only shoot and that's it. I only have a pass to the Zone, the PDA, the gun and everything.
How come you're almost empty here?

In fact, I had much more. I had accumulated enough money to buy Sidorovich. Before I entered the Zone, I agreed to pay for it, and at the checkpoint, I was billed that I did not have any money left. I escaped from the dogs and got here. I was greeted by the Wolf with the Fan, fed, watered, and the barrel was given.
And how can I help you?
I want to become a real stalker and to know the Zone as it is.
Haha. Are you saying stalker? Oh well. Do you have any food at least?
Nope.
We'll have to get the food first. Together, any way to keep it interesting. the main thing listen to me and do not lag behind.
OK I understood you.
Alice, I found a stew. Hold this to you for the first time.
Thank you.
Alice. We would get the equipment ready, so get ready and go for it.
I'm ready, where shall we go?
I think we need to visit Sidorovich and ask him what is interesting.
OK, let's go.
Hello, Sidorovich. Here such business. Do you have any interesting work for the company of beginners?
Hello, stalker. What are you interested in?
We ourselves understand beginners, we do not have special equipment, so we need something simple to get hold of.

Oh well. There is one thing. I hope you can shoot. In general, at the checkpoint, the military has become so insolent that they constantly persecute us and keep us in the way. Constant raids on the village have already exhausted our guys. Can you force the military out of the roadblock?
Well, you gave, uncle. We have only two weapons out of weapons and that's all. Can you give us something?
Hehe. You want trunks. Well, I have a couple of trunks that I do not mind. We will consider that this is your advance payment. Here you are.
That's how it would be right away. Thank you for the weapon, we undertake the task.
Alisa, I talked with Sidorovich and he gave us a job. He gave us weapons, here, hold.
Thank you. And what is our job?
Sidorovich asked to clean the military checkpoint.
What??? Have you seen how many of them? This is clearly suicide!
Such trunks will not be a problem. Especially since we can advance at night, then it will be easier for us to kill them. You do not want them to come here first and kill us?.
I understood you. I hope it's worth it.
We captured the checkpoint. Work is done.
Wow! Not bad for a gang of newbies. I am surprised.
It was not difficult.
As agreed, here is your fee.
Thanks, is there any other work?
Of course.
Sidorovich paid us well, this will be enough for the first time.
And how much did all this cost?
He gave us two rucksacks, two sets of batteries and 10 thousand wooden. I think it will be fair to divide them equally.
I support.
Here you are.
Maybe he has something else?
I about work.
Good. In general, I have a list of territories that need to be seized.
Well, send it to the flash-drive.
See you.
We took over the territory. Work is done.
Well done.
We took over the territory. Work is done.
Well done.
We took over the territory. Work is done.
Well done.
We took over the territory. Work is done.
Well done.
Sidorovich gave us a new assignment. He asked to grab some list of territories.
And what are they?
Swamp: Southern Farm, Dark Hollow: Refueling, Landfill: Depot, Army warehouses: Abandoned Farm.
Ok I got it.
Remind me the list of territories that you need to capture.
Swamp: Southern Farm, Dark Hollow: Refueling, Landfill: Depot, Army warehouses: Abandoned Farm.
Listen, Alice. Let's find you a detector. At least 'Response'.
And what is a detector?
A device that allows you to collect artifacts.
Listen, Alice. Here's a detector for you. It is better such than no.
Thank you so much! I can now search for artifacts?
Yes. If you collect artifacts-let's go to the scientists to sell them.
Alice, I found you a new detector. This is a bear '. Better than your 'Response' will be. Here, take it.
Thank you so much!
You're welcome.
This is the best detector that stalkers can find. Veles is named after the ancient God. He'll come in handy.
Thank you very much! I collect artifacts and we will be rich.
Oh, if all was so simple.
Listen, Alice. What is Mathis and how does he know you?
I had a friend. In general, this is a long story.
As far as I know we are in no hurry. Tell us, since we are one team.
Well, it's really not very interesting.
Alice, I'm waiting.

Okay. I had a friend Lyokha. We studied together at the institute. I learned about the Zone from him. He constantly spoke about her, very much wanted to go here. I discouraged him, they say it's dangerous, it's all Not known. He left without even saying goodbye. Only a couple of his notebooks with records remained, namely from there I found out with whom I had to agree, how much to pay and how to get here. While I was studying all the material, I decided to go here myself, but do not look for it, but just become a stalker. So I was inspired by his stories and records, that I decided to try myself in this role.

Half a year I saved money and decided to go here. It is very good that I met the Wolf and you. If it were not for you, you would surely be bent, for I am quite new here, and I do not shoot very well. In general, Lech asked him to go and help. He said something about a group of diggers. I did not fully understand his message, so let's go there quickly? Dell in general a dangerous place?

Well stalkers can rarely be found, there are only two parking lots. One is usually trying to keep the band its to shake the stalkers and grandmothers from them. But the mutants are full, you need to be more careful. Yes, and shotgun to get to make it easier to shoot them. Okay, good talking. Let's hit the road.
Hello, Alice and I heard your signal, you asked for help.
Hey. I call Matisom, you can just Lech. I'm here Tipo for the elder. To get you a job, I need to make sure you're okay. Good?
OK, let's try.
So look. With you how? How is it with 'green' or do you have any skill?
I'm quite 'green', let's all in detail.
I have the skill, so let's do it all at once, without the extra chatter.

So look. This is our camp, you can find it in your PDA, there will be my mark and a mark of stalkers (because the camp belongs to us). I will give you assignments, only you'll remember, there are many anomalies around and animals are not friendly here. Be careful, we did not have one more corpse. If you need there will be help-you will run to the camp, they will help.
Then without too much chatter, let's start.
Okay.
You said there was some sort of commission.
Yes, one of my people profukal his machine at pushka. He is very important to him, it's not far off, find it, huh? From the camp to the north you will go, you will find a push, there it lies.
And that's all for what you called us here?
Sdurel or what? No, I just cannot send people out on a quest, since we are guarding the camp. You see that there are very few people here.
Okay, I'll look for your gun.
Well, the stench is there, so do not go yourself? Here you are. And for that the engraving on the machine?
Yes for the old merits, somehow I'll tell later. Thank you very much for the machine gun.
We brought you a machine, some more help is required from us?

Of course. Here's the trunk that you pulled out of the jerk. To the north of our camp a pack of dogs lives. It's not difficult, I want to test your shooting skill. the trunk does not lose, it is still useful to me.
Oh, these checks. Okay, we'll be back soon.
the dogs are dead, and I stand before you. It was an uneven point and not difficult.
Well done, it was for warming up. Here, keep the reward:
What again you will think up on check? Again someone to poke?
Of course. Near the camp, boars organized a den, attacked at night. Kill them, please. You really excuse me for having so many checks, I want to prepare you for everything.
Ha, it's easy.
Boars will no longer bother your camp.
Well done, leave a sawn-off bag for yourself.
Listen, Matis. I started to run out of livestock here. Do you have something worthwhile or are we going?
Yes there is. Ticks needed hands free, ask him, he can find something for you.
Good
Hey. Matis sent me to you. He said that you have a job.
Hmm. Hey. Yes, I have a deal for you.
What do we have to do?

A group of Diggers carried us very important information, but on the way they got on a pack of wild dogs and they were ripped. In general, I need these documents at any cost, you know? There is a bridge to the north, where they lay down. To hide far away they all did not have time, so look there and drag everything that you can find.
I understood you.
I found the PDA, but it's encrypted, I cannot see it.
I see. Look, I myself cannot open it, we have this part Schultz. Go to him, let him look.
Okay
Schultz, hello. I found the PDA, I sent it to you. Have a look, please.
So so so. Agaaa. Just a second. I understood. Look, it says there that they hid everything on the bridge that we were carrying. So you look there. Tell Ticks about this and go look for it.
Thank you.
Mite, Schulz unblocked the PDAs, where it is indicated where to look for the documents that they carried to you. I'll go look for them, it's not far from the bridge. PDA take it to yourself.
Well, I'm waiting for you in the camp.
See you.
Mite, these are the documents that were there.
Give me a look. Interesting. Well-well, well.
Okay, I'll go.
Documents on hands, Alexey.
Thank you, buddy, I do not even know what we did without you. How do you know my name?
Well dak Alice told me. She said that you are old friends and very much asked to help you.

It is very good that you still received a message from me. Yes, we studied together. I went to the Zone without her. As you see, I became a very experienced stalker and now I keep the whole Hollow. We are constantly attacked by bandits. Ah, if not that night. so sorry for the guys, they were still quite green.
How did it happen that the rookies found themselves at night with documents far from the camp?

I had a group of rookies, which we prepared for diggers. the barman asked these guys for me to work on a part-time job. Well, I did not refuse him, because in exchange he offered the very documents that you brought to me.

the route was clean and everything was calculated. But something happened and with them communication ceased, then the obituary in the ESS finally came. You were there, did not you notice something strange?
I saw the boys bites, similar to the work of a bloodsucker. One had a bullet.
Do you think it was a controller or a killer?
I can only assume that something like this exists. It's very strange that neither the flash-drive nor the documents were lost. Guys just killed.
So I cannot understand what's wrong. Well, do not bother the nonsense. Thank you for your help. Look after Alice, please. You cannot stay with us, it's dangerous.
I will do everything in my power.
Thank you friend, drop by the light.
See you.
Did you see the message from Barkeep?
Did you get this message, too?
Yes, he wants to see us at the bar.
Okay, let's go.
Are there any special tasks?
Yes there is. Not far from our camp there is a camp of bandits. They often attack us at night. Can you get them out of there?
I think it's not difficult.
Okay, then I'll send you the coordinates.
Refueling is under our control.
Well done. Good job. Here is your reward.
Thank you.

Hold on. At the Garbage there is a group of guys, their diggers are called. They need people to raid, they themselves are not particularly stretched, the green ones are still. Help them, maybe they'll give you an important information.
Thank you, Mite. Be.
Happily.
Hello, Barman. We received a message from you. What kind of work did you want to offer us?
This is the territory of the Researchers. I want to check you, so you will need to go to them and prove yourself as a reliable person.
Okay, and who do I need?
You need Goofy. This is a local trader of researchers. He sells mostly their equipment and some unique rags. I'll take off his coordinates, he's waiting for you.
Thank you. We will return to this conversation.
Goofy?
Hello, stalker. You are on the basis of the IG.
Hmm. Hey. And what kind of clan are you?
I will tell you about this later. While you have a great chance to prove yourself in this place.
That sounds good. What do I need to do for this?
Go to Father Valerian. He's already waiting for you.
Hello, did you want to see me?

And I'm glad to see you, stalker. In general, this is the case. I here have broken through some channels. I was told that you are a very reliable person, there are very few people in the Zone who know you and this is our chance.
What exactly do you want?

I need someone who has not been exposed to the involvement of researchers and their allies. You perfectly suited this role. Especially you have a partner who no one knows. You know how the peasants react to the women in the zone.
This frightens me.
In general, I need help from you. Do you know the clan 'Freedom'?
No, I do not really know the clans.
I need you to gather some information. Since you are a free stalker, then you will be quietly allowed to the base. You will talk them, you will learn the information and report to me.
Have you decided to extinguish your opponent through a neutral stalker?
In war, all means are good. Well, will you help?
No, it's Game.
Yes, you can count on me.
Valerian offers to help us. I need your advice.
What exactly did he ask?
He wants us to make our way to 'Freedom' and learn from them some information.
And what is the benefit to us?
I myself do not know yet. Do you think it's worth handing them to 'Freedom' or helping?
Well, Barmen said something about the solid work, but first we need to prove ourselves. Decide youself.
Hey. I am new here.
Hello, new one. My name is Lukash, I am the leader of 'Freedom'. Make yourself at home.
Can you give us some kind of work?
Father Valerian asked me to get into trust with you, since very few people know me. I think they want to storm your base.
Nobody knows you yet, so no one will have anything to do. You can help the Liberty people and if you prove yourself-I'll give you a job.
Thank you. We will know.
OK I understood. See you.
See you.
Hello Friend. Tell me, please, what is your ideology?

Hello, stalker. Grouping Freedom is an anarchist group consisting mainly of free stalkers. the goal of the group is to preserve the Zone as a free territory and to oppose the monopoly of the authorities. the representatives of Freedom believe that the Zone cannot be defeated-it is possible and necessary to coexist with it. the zone is an excellent opportunity for research and study, and it should in no way be a springboard for the military.
Well, how long will you be silent?
I'm sorry, thoughtful. Is there anywhere to have a drink?
Yeah, right in the bar.
Hello Friend. Tell me about the ideology of Freedom.

Hello, stalker. Freedom is one of the strongest groupings of the Zone, as well as the only one of all large groups that openly opposes government forces and research groups. Freedom is the most numerous grouping in the Zone.
Everything is very simple for us. No laws and other shnyaga. Free life.
You'd better talk to the Leader about this.
Well thank you.
Happily.
Hello Friend. Tell me about the ideology of Freedom.

Hello, stalker. Freedom is one of the strongest groupings of the Zone, as well as the only one of all large groups that openly opposes government forces and research groups. Freedom is the most numerous grouping in the Zone.
Everything is very simple for us. No laws and other shnyaga. Free life.
You'd better talk to the Leader about this.
Well thank you.
Happily.
I cannot say that it was easy and fun, but I could not even imagine that something like that would happen. Why.
Slow down, friend. I understand that emotions overwhelm you and you want to tell me all this now, but I have a serious talk with you. I understand that we dragged you into this whole adventure.
Yeah, Alice and I did not expect this to happen. We only came to the Zone, but one of the clans managed to disintegrate.
You did not ruin it, it's just a coup among the group. You noticed what kind of clothes were the storm troopers?
That's what embarrassed me. They were dressed in exoskeletons of freedom, they had all the distinctive signs of freedom.

About this I say. Together with Voronin, we arranged a coup in freedom. Well, like a coup. Some Freedom fighters were dissatisfied with the current leader Lukash, after Miklukha left. You know who that is?
Are you kidding? I hardly know you, and you ask me about leaders of other clans.

In short, the founder of Freedom was stalker Miklukha. After he went to the radar was replaced by Lukash. I'm not particularly vdovalsya into details, but after the arrival of Lukash. began what-that float within the team. Some supported the old regime, others new. Adherents of the old regime decided to appeal to a debt and to hand over some part of the important information. For information, these were not the last people in freedom. In general, General Voronin offered to help me in this to turn things around. But the whole difficulty was that it was necessary to find a proven beginner.
And you decided to take us?

We asked Sidorovich to organize us rookies who will be able to carry out this task and at the same time will be trusted people. Yes, we had to attract Matis as soon as we found out that Alice had come. We had to connect to all this intelligence 'Duty'. the operation to seize the base of freedom was a very well-planned operation. One thing we missed was the bug that you threw Lukash. people to.
Wait. You said that you had to count the information.

Everything is absolutely true. But you did not even understand how you did it. You threw the virus on the PDA people Lukash, and even so, that they did not suspect anything. This allowed us to do it all. I think you should talk to one of these people. Our clan appreciates your contribution and we will ready to take you into their ranks at any time. Now go to Voronin.
I'm ready to join your clan.
It's very good, we need such trustworthy people as you.
Well, then from now on a member of our clan. Our house is your home.
I am very glad to join you.
Good health, Comrade General!
Free, fighter. You-then I just waited. I need your help.
How can I help you?
I got information about the dungeon of the Agroprom. There you need to find some information. But the paths are closed there, so you need to return to the Garbage and talk to a group of diggers.
After the Garbage to return here?
Yes. After you take the information from them, I'll give you all the necessary introductions and you'll go there. Now go look for a group of diggers, I hope they are still alive.
Hey. I'm interested in information about the dungeons of the agro industry.
Okay, keep these documents. I think you need them.
We do not have any information, you probably made a mistake.
I have the documents, here they are.
Hmm. interesting. There is a map pointing to the hiding place. It says that some documents are stashed. You need to go there and pick them up.
OK I understood.
tell me about yourself
Calling me Matvey as you probably guessed. Motey already called me here, I basically do not complain. I came to the zone like many here. for profit. Now the Zone has become my home.
